questions.skill: Solve systems involving quadratic and linear equations
questions.question: The graphs of y = x² and y = x + 6 intersect at two points. What is the x-coordinate of the intersection point where x is positive?
questions.explanation: Set the equations equal: x² = x + 6. Rearrange: x² - x - 6 = 0. Factor: (x - 3)(x + 2) = 0. Solutions are x = 3 and x = -2. The positive x-coordinate is 3.
